_comment: Only replace the words on the right side of the =.
Do not touch the words on the left. Once translated, save the file as "<region>.lang". e.g. "en_gb.lang"
Replace the first line of this file with the new region.
Never replace characters, such as "§<letter>" as these are colours!
Please create a pull request here once complete: https://github.com/MSpaceDev/MonsterTotems/pulls
Make the title of the pull request, "Added <region> translation support"

tooltip.missing: 没有更多信息!请联系模组作者!

tooltip.zombie_totem: 阻止在图腾附近生成僵尸和尸壳
tooltip.skeleton_totem: 阻止在图腾附近生成骷髅、凋灵骷髅和尸壳
tooltip.creeper_totem: 阻止在图腾附近生成苦力怕
tooltip.spider_totem: 阻止在图腾附近生成蜘蛛
tooltip.enderman_totem: 阻止在图腾附近生成末影人
tooltip.witch_totem: 阻止在图腾附近生成女巫
tooltip.silverfish_totem: 阻止在图腾附近生成蠹虫
tooltip.slime_totem: 阻止在图腾附近生成史莱姆
tooltip.blaze_totem: 阻止在图腾附近生成烈焰人

tooltip.magma_cube_totem: 阻止在图腾附近生成岩浆怪
tooltip.overworld_totem: 融合了僵尸、骷髅、苦力怕和蜘蛛的魂魄的图腾
tooltip.nether_totem: 融合了烈焰人、恶魂、僵尸猪人和岩浆怪的魂魄的图腾
tooltip.unnatural_totem: 融合了末影人、女巫、蠹虫和史莱姆的魂魄的图腾
tooltip.master_totem: 阻止在图腾附近生成所有怪物 §o(包括其他模组的怪物)
tooltip.totem_base: 构成图腾所必须的物品，同时也决定了图腾的生效范围
